<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Pounce](/Feats.aspx?ID=2052) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 188 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2047)

**Requirements**
You are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) by all of your opponents, and you aren't within 10 feet of any enemy.

</column>

---

You leap from the shadows to strike your foes. Stride up to your Speed, then Strike twice. If you were hidden or [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41) by the target of these Strikes, your foe is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against both attacks. Your multiple attack penalty applies normally for both attacks.
